Posts.Content: My mother is a 5 and a half year breast cancer survivor, only to have been just recently diagnosed with a reacurrance of it. She is now in the process of investigating the "hot spots" that have shown up on the PET scans, which have all been coming up as negative for cancer. She has one more to go... This is absolute torture for her, as it is for us to watch her go through this. I have been doing numerous searches on line at an endless rate only to find very devastating survival numbers. Is there anyone out there who has beaten this a second time, or knows of anyone who has??? There has to be some good news out there somewhere... I am worried sick.
Posts.Title: Living with cancer the second time around

Posts.Content: Nobody huh? That is not a good sign?
Posts.Title: Living with cancer the second time around

Posts.Content: Hi all. My mom has Mets Breast and is currently on Doxil and Herception. Her current MUGA scan showed some weakness. The doctor wants to put her on different meds. For anyone out there who knows anything about this, could you please shine some light on a very worried daughter?
Posts.Title: Metastatic breast cancer and MUGA results
